trans-unit.source: Provides a serializable type of endpoint address that is WS-Addressing V1 compliant and that enables it to be exposed as part of the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 提供可序列化类型的终结点地址是符合的 Ws-addressing V1，且可使作为服务协定的一部分进行公开。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not serializable nor is it tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>无法序列化，也不是与特定的 Ws-addressing 规范版本无关。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: This class provides a WS-Addressing V1 compliant wrapper for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that is serializable (implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface) and bound to the WS-Addressing V1 wire format.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供的 WS 寻址 V1 符合包装<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>可序列化 (实现<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口) 并将其绑定到 Ws-addressing V1 连网格式。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29> method does the wrapping and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.ToEndpointAddress%2A> method does the unwrapping, allowing the recovery of the endpoint address after it is serialized on the wire.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29>方法执行包装和<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.ToEndpointAddress%2A>方法执行取消包装操作，则会在网络上序列化后允许终结点地址的恢复。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.ToEndpointAddress%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] also supplies a class that provides a serializable type, <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004>, which is WS-Addressing August 2004 compliant for legacy purposes.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]此外提供了一个类，提供可序列化的类型， <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004>，即 Ws-addressing 2004 年 8 月符合出于兼容目的。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"></xref> class with a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"></xref>使用指定的终结点地址的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification or bound to a particular wire format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>与特定的 Ws-addressing 规范版本无关，也没有绑定到特定的连网格式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> used to initialize the instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>用于初始化此类的实例</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"></xref> class that contains the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"> </xref>类，其中包含指定的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML-qualified name that describes the XML representation of the version 1.0 endpoint address from a specified cached schema.
trans-unit.target: 返回描述的 XML 表示形式从指定的缓存架构的 1.0 版终结点地址的 XML 限定名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is required by the serialization contract.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是通过序列化协定所必需的。

trans-unit.source: It must be public to be seen by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是公共归<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: It is not intended to be called by developers.
trans-unit.target: 它不是调用由开发人员。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that contains a cache of the XML schema definition language (XSD) schemas for the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>包含的终结点地址的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的缓存。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that describes the XML representation of the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>描述的 XML 表示形式的终结点地址。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: xmlSchemaSet is .
trans-unit.target: xmlSchemaSetis .

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> from which the endpoint address is obtained.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>从中获取终结点地址。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which the current endpoint address is saved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>当前终结点地址所保存到。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the endpoint address contained in this serializable type.
trans-unit.target: 检索此可序列化类型中包含的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> used to initialize the instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>用于初始化此类的实例</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>
